paragraphs.text: It’s very hard not to rant and rave and vent. I have purposely avoided watching the news for the past few months because there’s so much negativity and chaos out there that its hard to stay engaged, and keep an optimistic outlook. BUT stay engaged we must, otherwise, everything will just continue on a downward spiral.
